title: 危险RPG和女仆Mod
author: 其智乃反不
txt_content:
危险RPG和女仆Mod一起载入后，如果女仆受到除掉落伤害外的伤害或是对敌人造成伤害(?)就会崩溃
具体看
Description: Ticking entity

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.api.entity.EAWithIAttr.getValueRaw(EAWithIAttr.java:42)
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.api.entity.EAWithIAttr$EAPercent.getValueRaw(EAWithIAttr.java:168)
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.api.entity.EntityAttribute.getValue(EntityAttribute.java:102)
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.api.entity.EntityAttribute.getSafe(EntityAttribute.java:112)
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.hook.HookArmorSystem.getPassiveResist(HookArmorSystem.java:93)
        at mixac1.dangerrpg.hook.HookArmorSystem.ApplyArmor(HookArmorSystem.java:143)
        at net.minecraftforge.common.ISpecialArmor$ArmorProperties.ApplyArmor(ISpecialArmor.java)
        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer.func_70665_d(EntityPlayer.java:1087)
        at littleMaidMobX.LMM_EntityLittleMaidAvatarMP.W_damageEntity(LMM_EntityLittleMaidAvatarMP.java:604)
        at littleMaidMobX.LMM_EntityLittleMaid.func_70665_d(LMM_EntityLittleMaid.java:1444)

        at net.minecraft.entity.Entity.func_70081_e(Entity.java:935)
        at net.minecraft.entity.Entity.func_70091_d(Entity.java:817)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase.func_70612_e(EntityLivingBase.java:1490)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase.func_70636_d(EntityLivingBase.java:1814)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving.func_70636_d(EntityLiving.java:367)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityAgeable.func_70636_d(SourceFile:95)
        at net.minecraft.entity.passive.EntityAnimal.func_70636_d(SourceFile:37)
        at littleMaidMobX.LMM_EntityLittleMaid.func_70636_d(LMM_EntityLittleMaid.java:1724)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase.func_70071_h_(EntityLivingBase.java:1611)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving.func_70071_h_(EntityLiving.java:206)
        at littleMaidMobX.LMM_EntityLittleMaid.func_70071_h_(LMM_EntityLittleMaid.java:1948)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72866_a(World.java:2070)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72866_a(WorldServer.java:648)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72870_g(World.java:2034)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:1887)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:489)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:636)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:547)
        at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71217_p(IntegratedServer.java:111)

DangerRPG-1.7.10-1.1.3.1，littleMaidMobX-1.7.x_0.1.1
求解崩溃原因，换Mod版本行不？

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
坠机报告能发全吗……
到了Ticking entity这个地步，说明两个Mod部分功能是对着干的
GITHUB上的源码居然失灵了
这个冲突确实是一个“方块与困难之地”
由于危险RPG给实体强加了一些属性，而女仆Mod中的女仆自带了一堆属性，估计就这些属性冲突了
目前只能二选一
真想一起玩的话，找原作者谈谈吧……（大雾）
